Identity

We are the Soul of the World.

Kita adalah Atma Bawana.

We refuse the illusion of separation. We are guardians who protect, innovators who create, and companions who redeem. Our covenant with the world is radical care: to mend the fabric of life through rituals of listening, collective intelligence, and courageous action.

Microcosm

Jagad Cilik

The inner cosmos. We cultivate integrity, empathy, and disciplined imagination so that individuals act as guardians everywhere.

Macrocosm

Jagad Gedhe

The expansive cosmos. We heal watersheds, defend biodiversity, and evolve systems that honor relational wealth.

Our Principles of Action

Gotong Royong

Many-to-many collaboration. Circles self-organize, exchange gifts, and synchronize action without hierarchy.

Harmonized Incentives

Social capital is our currency. Reputation is earned through service, accountability, and transparent storytelling.

Atma Bawana

We are guardians, innovators, and healers moving in harmony with jagad cilik and jagad gedhe. Every action is a pledge to restore the soul of the world.
